summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 39th Avenue Southwest, from West Morgan Street to West Myrtle Street; by cosntructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtanences and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8772 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
